parameter.name: randomSeed
parameter.displayName: randomSeed - Control of random number generator [integer value]

parameter.name: porpoiseCount
parameter.displayName: porpoiseCount - Number of porpoises at start of simulation [unitless]

parameter.name: trackedPorpoiseCount
parameter.displayName: trackedPorpoiseCount - Number of porpoises to track the xy coordinates [unitless]

parameter.name: landscape
parameter.displayName: landscape - Simulation landscape to be used

parameter.name: debug
parameter.displayName: debug - Code testing parameter [values 0-5]

parameter.name: turbines
parameter.displayName: turbines - Wind farm construction scenario to be used

parameter.name: ships
parameter.displayName: Ships enabled

parameter.name: dispersal
parameter.displayName: Large-scale movement type

parameter.name: tdisp
parameter.displayName: tDisp - Days of declining energy before activating dispersal [days]

parameter.name: PSM_log
parameter.displayName: PSM_log - Logistic increase in random turning angle after PSM dispersal step [unitless]

parameter.name: PSM_dist
parameter.displayName: PSM_dist - Preferred distance to dispersal target [km]

parameter.name: PSM_tol
parameter.displayName: PSM_tol - Tolerance band within which the dispersal cell is selected [km]

parameter.name: PSM_angle
parameter.displayName: PSM_angle - Maximum turning angle after each PSM dispersal step [degrees]

parameter.name: q1
parameter.displayName: q1 - PSM Type 3 travel distance weight [unitless]

parameter.name: rS
parameter.displayName: rS - Satiation memory decay rate [unitless]

parameter.name: rR
parameter.displayName: rR - Reference memory decay rate [unitless]

parameter.name: rU
parameter.displayName: rU - Food replenishment rate

parameter.name: bycatchProb
parameter.displayName: bycatchProb - Annual bycatch probability [unitless]

parameter.name: simYears
parameter.displayName: simYears - Simulation period [years]

parameter.name: k
parameter.displayName: k - Inertia constant; the animal's tendency to keep moving using CRW irrespective of foraging success.

parameter.name: a0
parameter.displayName: a0 - Autoregressive coefficient for log10(d/100)

parameter.name: a1
parameter.displayName: a1 - Coefficient of water depth on log10(d/100) [unitless]

parameter.name: a2
parameter.displayName: a2 - Coefficient of salinity on log10(d/100) [unitless]

parameter.name: b0
parameter.displayName: b0 - Autoregressive coefficient for turning angles in CRW [unitless]

parameter.name: b1
parameter.displayName: b1 - Coefficient of water depth on turning angles in CRW [unitless]

parameter.name: b2
parameter.displayName: b2 - Coefficient of salinity on turning angles in CRW [unitless]

parameter.name: b3
parameter.displayName: b3 - Intercept of turning angle in CRW [unitless]

parameter.name: c
parameter.displayName: c - Deterrence coefficient [unitless]

parameter.name: RT
parameter.displayName: T - Minimum received sound level for deterrence [dB]

parameter.name: c_ships
parameter.displayName: c_ships - Deterrence coefficient for ships

parameter.name: T_ships
parameter.displayName: T_ships - Response threshold for ships

parameter.name: Psi_deter
parameter.displayName: Psi_deter - Deterrence decay constant [percent]

parameter.name: ddisp
parameter.displayName: ddisp - Dispersal distance per time step [km]

parameter.name: dmax_mov
parameter.displayName: dmax_mov - max movement distance

parameter.name: Euse
parameter.displayName: Euse - Energy use per half-hour step in May-September

parameter.name: Elact
parameter.displayName: Elact - Energy use multiplier for lactating mammals

parameter.name: Ewarm
parameter.displayName: Ewarm - Energy use multiplier in warm water

parameter.name: h
parameter.displayName: h - Probability of becoming pregnant

parameter.name: tdeter
parameter.displayName: tdeter - Deterrence time [time steps]

parameter.name: dmax_deter
parameter.displayName: dmax_deter - Maximum deterrence distance [km]

parameter.name: alpha_hat
parameter.displayName: alpha_hat - Absorption coefficient for sound

parameter.name: beta_hat
parameter.displayName: beta_hat - Spreading loss factor for sound

parameter.name: tgest
parameter.displayName: tgest - Gestation time [days]

parameter.name: tnurs
parameter.displayName: tnurs - Nursing time [days]

parameter.name: tmaxage
parameter.displayName: tmaxage - Maximum age [years]

parameter.name: tmature
parameter.displayName: tmature - Age of maturity [years]

parameter.name: wdisp
parameter.displayName: wdisp - Minimum water depth when dispersing [m]

parameter.name: wmin
parameter.displayName: wmin - Minimum water depth [m]

parameter.name: beta
parameter.displayName: beta - Survival probability constant

parameter.name: Umin
parameter.displayName: Umin - Minimum food level in a patch [relative unit]

parameter.name: wrapBorderHomo
parameter.displayName: wrapBorderHomo - Wrap border of homogeneous landscape [true/false]

parameter.name: R1
parameter.displayName: R1 - Log10 distance moved per time step [m] - N(mean;1SD)

parameter.name: R2
parameter.displayName: R2 - Turning angle between steps [degrees] - N(mean;1SD)

parameter.name: tmating
parameter.displayName: tmating - Mating day [day of year] - N(mean;1SD)

parameter.name: Einit
parameter.displayName: Einit - Initial energy level [relative unit] - N(mean;1SD)
